meta-runner.name: DNX - DNU publish
meta-runner.description: Packages an ASP.NET 5 application into a build artifact.

param.name: mr.ArtifactsName
param.spec: text description='What should the output artifact name be?' validationMode='not_empty' label='Output artifact name:' display='normal'

param.name: mr.Configuration
param.spec: text description='Build configuration (e.g. Debug or Release)' validationMode='not_empty' label='Build configuration:' display='normal'

param.name: mr.ProjectJson
param.spec: text validationMode='not_empty' label='Path to project.json:' display='normal'

param.name: mr.wwwroot
param.spec: text description='The directory of the wwwroot. If none, package is build as console app or library' validationMode='not_empty' label='wwwroot Directory:' display='normal'

param.name: mr.Runtime
param.spec: text validationMode='not_empty' label='Runtime to build:' display='normal'
